name: Rolling-Imax-Processor
summary: Processes raw intensity data stored in a nested Year/Month/Day folder structure. Reads per-minute rainfall breakpoint data (mm/min) from Excel files named dd-mm-yyyy.xlsx. Calculates rolling maximum values for intensity classes I1 to I60 and outputs the results in mm/min.
author: Akshar Singh Rawat, Dr Sadikul Islam, Dr M Muruganandam
